title: Justiciar's Scimitar

Justiciar's Scimitar

Shadow-Blinding: If you attack with Advantage, you have a chance to Blind your target.

Weapon Enchantment +2

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

This light, curved blade is as unsusual and unforgiving as the Darkness it strikes from.

Scimitar Light Finesse

Justiciar's Scimitar is one of the Slashing Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Justiciar's Scimitar is a crafty magical scimitar that allows to attack from concealmente without alerting the enemy and has a chance to Blind if attacking with advantage. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.). Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain special Actions while holding it.

This light, curved blade is as unsusual and unforgiving as the Darkness it strikes from.

BG3 Justiciar's Scimitar Information

Shadow-Blinding: If you attack with Advantage, you have a chance to Blind your target. Range: 1.5m

BG3 Justiciar's Scimitar Location & Where to Find

Location: Gauntlet of Shar Dropped by: Lythindor in the Gauntlet of Shar (The last Justiciar, disguised as a rat. He can be found at the foot of the giant statue of Shar. see quest Break Yurgir's Contract)

Justiciar's Scimitar Notes & Tips for BG3
